channel.title: Week II on Xtern Bootcamp 2018
channel.description: Recent content in Week II on Xtern Bootcamp 2018

item.title: Day 5: Intro to React
item.description: Monday, July 2, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 5, part 1 Afternoon: Playlist | Day 5, part 1 Topics ES2015+ (ES6+) Modules (import/export) - ES2015 modules on Babel React Imperative vs. Declarative Components JSX - Docs: Introducing JSX Props - Docs: Components and Props State - Docs: State and Lifecycle create-react-app Stateless Functional Components Stateless Functional Components in React Functional Components vs.

item.title: Day 6: React
item.description: Tuesday, July 3, 2018 Lecture Videos Morning: Playlist | Day 6, part 1 Afternoon: Playlist | Day 6, part 1 Topics React Documentation create-react-app Google Fonts CSS in JS Using map with components Forms Controlled vs. Uncontrolled Form inputs in React Mastering Markdown Examples Using map with Components Person.js class Person extends React.Component { render() { return ( <li>Hello, {this.props.person.name}!</li> ) } } export default Person PersonList.
